name: Tubby
title: "Rain Calmer" Tubby
desc: "Steeping a pot of tea, watching over the abode, accompanying the Traveler and Paimon to await the arrival of Ping and the others, watching the cloud-filled sky. These days of not having to concern myself with matters of adeptal import truly are ones of leisure..."\n"Oh! Oh dear, I must have fallen asleep again. It's a good thing that no one noticed..."

skills.desc: When playing a Location Support Card: Spend 2 less Elemental Dice. (Once per Round)
